title: eth_getTransactionReceipt gives bogus results for non-existent transaction on v2.52.5
body:
The tx 0xba1cc1bf89151a62269f0aacf13eedae215dc209de4c821b5bcb460de659b7f5 does not exist and was never mined in any block. We pass it to a eth_getTransactionReceipt RPC. In v2.48.1, the behavior is to return a null result, since no such TX exists. But on 2.52.5, a bogus result is returned.

#### Expected behaviour (seen on v2.48.1)
curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data '{"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "eth_getTransactionReceipt", "id": 2557, "params": ["0xba1cc1bf89151a62269f0aacf13eedae215dc209de4c821b5bcb460de659b7f5"]}' http://localhost:8545

{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":2557,"result":null}

#### Actual behaviour (seen on v2.52.5)
curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data '{"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "eth_getTransactionReceipt", "id": 2557, "params": ["0xba1cc1bf89151a62269f0aacf13eedae215dc209de4c821b5bcb460de659b7f5"]}' http://localhost:8545

Result returns a bunch of nonsense rather than a null result:
{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":2557,"result":{"blockHash":"0x671f16238f05367d7feea80573e5fdba3c67b75669a55bee3bb450784c9f4a8f","blockNumber":"0x4318ec","contractAddress":null,"cumulativeGasUsed":"0x5208","effectiveGasPrice":"0x9c7652400","from":"0x32be343b94f860124dc4fee278fdcbd38c102d88","gasUsed":"0x5208","logs":[],"logsBloom":"","status":"0x1","to":"0x63b6b68f2a1b9b5fc7a1171950fdfd64f261ca71","transactionHash":"0xba1cc1bf89151a62269f0aacf13eedae215dc209de4c821b5bcb460de659b7f5","transactionIndex":"0x0","type":"0x0"}}

Also notably both versions seem to have correct behavior for eth_getTransactionByHash:

v2.48.1:
$ curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data '{"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "eth_getTransactionByHash", "id": 2557, "params": ["0xba1cc1bf89151a62269f0aacf13eedae215dc209de4c821b5bcb460de659b7f5"]}' http://localhost:8545
{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":2557,"result":null}

v2.52.5:
$ curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" --data '{"jsonrpc": "2.0", "method": "eth_getTransactionByHash", "id": 2557, "params": ["0xba1cc1bf89151a62269f0aacf13eedae215dc209de4c821b5bcb460de659b7f5"]}' http://localhost:8545
{"jsonrpc":"2.0","id":2557,"result":null}
Erigon v2.53.4 also has the same issue.
